Encoder converts analog feed into multicast IP packets and it carries out compression as well. HE1

Multicast is communication between a single sender and multiple receivers on a network. Multicast is group communication. where data transmission is addressed to a group of destination computers simultaneously. HE2

MPEG is a compression standard used for compressing video and audio files to a smaller physical size, it also handles the transmission of these files. Moving Picture Experts Group is the name given to the group of people responsible for setting the MPEG standards. There are various adaptations of the MPEG standard each with their own specification and usage in the industry. HE3
Scrambler is used for encryption and decryption of channels and it is integrated with CAS system at the back end. HE4

Probes are monitoring devices. It monitors video parameters like PID, CHID, Channel bandwidth etc. HE6
